display_name: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index: Habitual sleep efficiency component subscore
description:
Subscore based on 3 items from Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index, with a range of 0-3. A score of "0" indicates no difficulty, while a score of "3" indicates severe difficulty. [Buysse et. al 1989 (PubMed ID: 2748771)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/2748771/)

External semantic reference: [CDE](https://cde.nlm.nih.gov/deView?tinyId=mkdasX5iSR)

[Search for all PSQI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=psqi)

Source: :psqi_1:, :psqi_3:, :psqi_4:
